case.state: First things first: I'm Calisto Yew, a defense attorney.
By the way, do you know who I am? My name is Calisto Yew.
Juri Han? Really? You think this game needstwo insanely violent daughters of dead prosecutors?
Juri Han? Really? You think this game needs a dose of "insanely violent daughter of a prosecutor"?
Elaine Marley-Threepwood? Phwwh... better not remind her she's married. Phwwh... Or what a loser she's married to.
Phwwwh... you're not really thinking of inviting Whip Girl to play, are you?
Her? What, are you picking with "Eeny, Meeny, Miney, Mo" or something?
Ini Miney? ...You're obviously not here for the conversation.
Mia Fey? There's only one reason you'd invite her to play. Phwwwwh... Or more accurately... two big reasons.
Oh, please not her. Anyone but her. She makes me feel gross, and I lie to people for fun.
Phwwh... you want to play strip poker with a five-inch tall ball of light? Ahahahahahahahaha!
Revy? Phwwh... so much for the family-friendly game. Ahah... so to speak, of course.
Wait, her name is actually "Sheena?" Phwwhf... seeing her, now I feel embarrassed for using it...
I think you meant to pick the other Sheena. Phwwhf... that is... the other other Sheena.
Streaming-chan? Phwwh... hope you like having your nudes all over the internet!
Ha ha ha... that's nice. Sounds kind of fun, actually.
...Wait. You... you're that von Karma girl, aren't you...? And you brought that ridiculous whip of yours?...Phwwwwwwwwh...
Phwwhf... Hey, Mia... Aren't you that newbie whose mentor got killed? Phwwwwhf... you know you don't have to do everything your mentor does, right?
Phwwwhf... I can't believe your name is actually Sheena... I think I wore it better!
Phwwwhf... I can't believe your name is actually Sheena... I definitely wore it better!
Ahahahahahaha! This is strip poker! Why are there so many serious faces?!
Phwwh... I'm also an ace attorney, so the idea of you beating me is... phwwwh...
Phwwh... of course, since I'm an ace attorney, your chances of winning are... phwwwh...
It's time for me to prove my worth.
This promises to be interesting.
...Fine. You amuse me, so I'll humor you with a little courtroom practice.
As if I'd tell you how many cards I exchanged.
Never flaunt your evidence in court... or in card games.
Let me think.
I'm sure this is the right move.
I don't need a lot of time to think.
I won't tell you how many cards I'm exchanging, even if it doesn't make a difference.
This is like deciding the right evidence to present.
I hope this is the right decision.
I don't have to tell you how many cards I traded.
Don't expect me to tell you how many cards I'm getting. Watch them, if you care so much.
Ace attorneys like me have to go on instinct...
If you want to know how many I'm trading, pay attention.
Phwwh... if you want to know how many I exchanged, pay attention next time.
You really think I'd help you? Phwwh...
Ahaha... I exercise my right to remain silent!
Heh heh... these won't do at all...
Ahahaha! ...No.
Ahahahahahaha!
Ahaha... these aren't good...
Phwwh... Oh no... this isn't a good start...
You expect me to keep cards like this?
...No, thank you.
Hrm... should I exchange this one, or...?
Phwwh... these cards are...!
No reason to worry. I'll just relax for a bit.
I definitely have something good to present here.
I'm ready to see who lost this round.
I wonder who the unfortunate one will be this round.
My defense attorney skills are good for more than trials.
No objections will be needed.
There is no way to refute this hand.
You can't be afraid of losing if you have good cards.
I have something good to present. ...As in my hand, not my body.
Someone is going to lose, and it won't be me this time.
I still have good evidence to present.
No one can refute my cards now. I guarantee it.
As a more experienced poker player, I'm happy to give you this lesson. Free of charge, even.
Pwwwwf... sorry, it's just... pwwwwf... you think you can still win...
I love to hear people complain about their awful hands. Phwwwh...
I may have taken a few penalties, but I'll get my verdict in the end.
I can still come back. I just need these idiots to lose already.
I won't give up--I've come too far.
Ahahahaha! The odds of this happening are... ahahahaha!
Ahahahahahaha! You look like you're all ready to go! You have no idea what's about to happen!
Phwwh... why does everyone here talk about how good their hand is? It's just giving your opponents free information!
Ahahahahaha! Thanks, dealer!
Take your time. Phwwh... You'll need it.
Phwwwwh... you think you have me on the ropes, don't you? But I'm just getting started.
...Are you done yet?
Not the best hand, but good enough to beat the worst.
This is fine. I have a good feeling about this round.
This hand could be good or bad. We're all going to find out together.
If there's one thing I can't stand, it's waiting.
This isn't what I expected.
Hrm. Is there a way I can use this...?
Hmph. That exchange could have gone better.
...Good enough to beat you, anyway.
I probably made the right move. We'll just have to see.
Someone's definitely worse off than I am.
I wish I had something better, but whatever.
Logic can't beat luck, but at least luck beats bad players.
Is this hand bad? ...No, I could be in a far worse position.
I hope no one does any better than me.
This will be good enough to present.
I won't be going down. Not even at this rate.
Phwwh... I'm ready whenever you are.
Phwwh... maybe you can beat me this round if you don't play like a moron. Phwwh... so... probably not.
This game is mostly about luck anyway. Someone's has to be worse than mine.
No use making a useless objection.
...The dealer is trying to mess with me. Not that I have any evidence of it besides this hand...
Situations like this make me think about forging evidence...
Hmmm... how to best present this...
This has to be bad luck.
...This isn't the dealer's fault. It's mine, for getting involved in this game to begin with.
Who could possibly have a better hand than me?
After review, I have to conclude this hand is legit. Unfortunately for me.
This is bad, but I really can't focus on losing.
I can't lose now. Someone has to have a worse hand...!
Ahahahahaha!
Pwwwffff... sorry, this hand just...
Ahaha... snrk... sorry, I just... this hand...
Ahaha... I hope... you can beat this...
Oh... pwwwffff... oh no... ahahahahahaha!
Oh dear... pwwwfff...
Snrk... oh... okay...
Nnnghoooh...
...So. Is this going to be it for me...?
Nnnghooooh!
Hey, is that a gun? To be honest, even if it's just once, I've always wanted to try firing one. Hey! Is that thing loaded? Do you think I could give it a try right now?
Here's some free advice: Always keep a good eye on a criminal, or you may regret what comes of your negligence.
I have to get naked? ...Fake evidence! It must be!
It appears that wasn't the brightest move...
Perhaps card games aren't like court trials after all...
I lost? Hmph. I guess I erred in my judgment.
I lost? How is that even possible?!
...I'll strip this time, but you still have a long way to go to take me down.
This game isn't rigged, is it? ...No, I wouldn't have this much clothing left if it was.
Hmph. I must have zoned out a bit this round.
What? I didn't expect to lose again!
Nnngooooh!
I'm not a sore loser in court, so I'm definitely not one in a card game.
Oh, was that a declaration of war? How nice it is to be young and carefree.
Aw, why did you have to ruin my fun...? Phwwwwwwwh... Well, shall I continue?
OBJECTION! ...Err. I don't have any excuses left, do I...?
I need some more practice with card games. I'll do that after I win this whole thing.
You cannot be serious!
Some people just happen to get the better cards. ...Fine then.
I may have lost this time, but we'll see who's the winner in the end.
At least you know I'm not cheating...
Extraterritorial rights! ...I can't use that as an excuse here, can I?
Can I object? There must be a loophole in the rules somewhere...
According to my hand... I actually lost?!
Nghoooh...
At least you all know I'm not a cheater.
Phwwh! Well, you just can't avoid some things in life.
OBJECTION! ...Err. I don't have any excuses left, do I...?
...Lucky for all of you, I'm not the type of person to kill someone because of a card game.
Grr... I just need to rethink my strategy...!
I'd never lose this badly in court...!
Wh... am I playing too carelessly?
Unbelievable! I want everyone's testimonies after this game!
Phwwwf... I don't want to give up, but I'm starting to get a bit worried...
Ngooh... I shouldn't have switched those cards after all...
The only law that applies here is Murphy's Law.
I demand someone investigate this! ...And a real detective, not that idiot Gumshoe!
Hey, dealer! What, are you secretly Manfred von Karma or something?!
...! Y-you can't be serious...!
Is someone here secretly a prodigy prosecutor?
You're sending the biggest chill down my spine right now...
It looks like... you've seen through me yet again...
OBJECTION! ...Err. I don't have any excuses left, do I...?
I should really start paying attention to how I play, what with me being the only woman and all.
I'm used to an all-guy audience... just not in this situation.
The most logical things to remove first are my shoes. It's also common sense... if you aren't an idiot.
My socks are next. I really hope none of you are into feet.
I hate losing, but I play fair. I'm taking off both of my socks.
Let's see... I suppose my jacket is next.
Fine, I'll play by the rules. Off goes my tie.
Heh heh... it's been a while since I've had this much fun.
I normally only wear these panties with another disgui- outfit, but I thought they'd be appropriate for tonight.
This is a halter bra, so this will take me a second.
I've had a lot of fun today, but I grow weary of this game of cat and mouse.
This probably won't be the last time I have to strip... but I'm still planning on winning this thing regardless.
It's all about who's on top when the game'is over. So let's get back to it.
Sorry, folks. Nothing to see here.
Leave all comments in the box on my desk, please.
I think I'll let loose, and then we can have a real battle of wits.
Phwwh... They were supposed to bring me luck. I think we can all see how that's working out.
Sorry about that. I wasn't really planning on taking it off.
Let's make this my last loss, and wrap up this absurd game once and for all!
Trying to play the tough, silent guy card, are we? Phwwhf... you're not pulling it off!
Bahaha... be a man and accept your loss!
Hahahaha! I love to see a guy like you lose! Hahahahaha!
Man up and admit you've lost.
I wouldn't call you overconfident. Phwwwh... I'd call you "cocky!" Phwwh...
Aren't you supposed to be programmed with a powerful AI? Perhaps your creator intentionally made you an idiot on purpose! Phwwh...
Pwwwhf... uh oh... better not take any cupcakes from her now...
Pwaha... guess you're about as perfect as dear old Papa, hmm?
Phwwwh...! Perfect this, perfect that... Stop being so uptight! Or is that a requisite trait for being a von Karma?
I'm sorry to burst your bubble, Faye, but you're not the best poker player.
I appreciate your determination, but you're not getting a perfect win today.
Don't think you can just bat your eyelashes at the judge and get out of this.
You remind me a lot of that von Karma girl. Phwwh...
I think it's, phwwh... high noon for you now, phwwwh...
Don't "Aimee" those guns at me. Phwwwh...
You comin' a-killin' now? Phwwwh...
Maybe you would be better at "Strip Mexican Standoff." Phwwwh...
Are you sure you're the Ultimate Gamer? I really expected more from you.
I've seen grandmas using smartphones play games better than you.
You should go back to playing solitaire.
Phwwwhf... hey, ~target~... looks like that hand really burned you, huh?
Maybe you can use a magic item to go back in time? You know, the magic item that you irresponsibly wasted on a mundane situation?
Phwwwwhf... hey, Ini or Mini or whoever... after a loss that bad, you might need a trip to the burn unit!
Nothing is impossible for Kim Possible... except for winning card games.
Ron would love to hear what you've been doing here. I suggest you make the story more interesting.
Aren't you supposed to be the Ultimate Detective? Phwwh... Can you deduce how you lost this round?
Phwwh... looks like you really got burned by that hand, huh?
Please take a selfie after you strip. I want it as evidence you lost.
Send me a memento, preferably with me in it. I want people to know which of us is the better woman.
Have you considered playing this game with only males? Maybe you'd better.
"Meia" suggest you give up now? Phwwwh...
What's wrong, Meia? Are you afraid of reporting to your captain about this? Phwwh...
Maybe I can be a pirate just like you. Phwwh... I just need to be super serious, and keep losing the game like you!
I have a feeling you lost on purpose just to captivate ~player~.
You're the type to plead guilty before a trial even begins, aren't you?
You're just a nuisance in this game, ~name~.
Speaking in terms of competency, you're fit for the stripping part of this game but unfit for the playing part. Where's the fun in that?
I hope you're better at taking jokes than you are at this game, ~name~. Phwwh...
It looks like you aren't "Revy" to strip in front of us! Phwwh...
Is it possible to die from laughter? Phwwwh... I just want to make sure, before...
Should I be scared of you? I feel like you're less scary, and more... phwwwh...
Zombies would be better at this than you.
I don't there there is anything to be scared of, Velma. Maybe public humiliation.
How are you< the smartest in your group? That's a mystery to solve.
You won't be able to distract them with your female charm when I'm in this state! Baaahahaha!
My, my. What an unusual case this is.
Phwwf... in that case... this was a complete waste of time! Ahahahaha!
...Really?
Well, that was a waste of time.
Maybe you should get rid of that magatama for good... phwwwh...
Don't worry, Angie, I'll make sure to step all over your ~clothing~. Ahahahahaha!
Sunglasses are a nice start. Now it's easier to see me laugh at your face. Phwwwh...
...Really?
There's nothing to be mad about. Ahahahahaha! You didn't even take off something serious.
Phwwwh... Ahahahahahaha! You think I'm impressed by your sharpshooting? Hahahahaha!
Phwwh... Hahahaha! I can't take you seriously trying to be cool like that. You're shooting your own clothes off. Hahahaha!
If you wanted to strip so badly, you should've come here without the extra stuff on you.
If I do that, will you promise to get even angrier? Phwwh... Ahahahaha! I would love to see how fierce you can be.
Phwahahahahaha! See how crystal clear I look? Ahahahahaha!
Pwwwwwwwwwhf... ppwwwwwwwwwwwwhf... yeah... the bracelets... must be...
Hahaha. Ahem. I don't care how well you can shoot. I think it's hysterical that you're trying to show off.
Phwwh... Ahahaha. Ahem. You think you're such hot stuff with that shooting? You just look ridiculous.
Ahahahahahaha! I bet you failed to be a great spirit medium. Just like your mother. Aha... aha...
Well, that was a waste of time.
I was hoping for something more substantial than this.
Are we done here?
Phwwwh... Ahahahaha! You're a female counterpart of guys showing off their muscles and trucks. Phwwh... Ahahahahahaha!
Too bad your "hand" lost you this round... phwwwh...
I was hoping for something more substantial than this.
Ahahaha. Ahem. Maybe you aren't aware of how much your showing off is embarrassing you.
Are we done here?
Ahahahahahahahaha! I still can't take you seriously with that act though. It's like you're trying to be dark and mysterious in an ironic way. Phwwh... Hahahaha!
Finally, some real progress.
That's why I'll do it for you. Only a meathead like you would fail this hard at poker. Ahahahahaha!
I sense we're coming to the end soon...
You can give up any time, but I know you want to be the big serious man who still wants to win... phwwwh... Ahahahaha!
Phwwwh... Ahahahahahaha! You think I am impressed by your sharp shooting? Hahahahaha!
Phwwh... Hahahaha! I can't take you seriously trying to be cool like that. You're shooting your own clothes off. Hahahaha!
Finally, some real progress.
You're glad to show off your body, but I still have the beauty of a Gardevoir.
You're about to be weeded out very soon, phwwh...
If you were a gardening tool, phwwh... you'd be a hoe, phwwwh...
I'll give you credit, you're pretty brave to strip in front of an audience without hesitating.
~player~ will actually notice you more if you keep stripping, you know. Isn't that what you want?
Hey Monika, ~player~ talked to me before playing this game. They told me they really love to see you naked. Phwwh... Hehehe.
I have a feeling you won the Pokemon Champion title through bribery.
Ahahahahaha! I'm just kidding! Why are you so obsessed with a loser who only wants fanservice bait like you?
Hahaha. Ahem. I don't care how well you can shoot. I think it's hysterical that you're trying to show off.
Hahahahaha! Give it up already... with romance and with this game, that is! Phwahahahaha!
That's why I'll do it for you. Only a bimbo like you would fail this hard at poker. Ahahahahaha!
I sense we're coming to the end soon...
Hahahahahahaha! I don't care if that's unoriginal, there was no other time to say that. Ahahahaha!
Ahahahahaha! Get ready to be plowed by the end of the game, too. Phwwh... Ahahahaha!
I think you accidentally nerfed yourself.
To be fair, you're already pretty revealing in court. Maybe that explains your confidence... phwwh... hahaha.
I'm still much more beautiful than you, even before I was masturbating, or before I completely stripped down.
I don't suppose you have an undershirt.
I will be the judge of your looks.
It's time to see how much brawn you have... you know, since you don't have any brains.
Are you excited to show off your chest? Don't worry, I'll ignore you either way.
You don't have any gold medals, right? That Jacques Portman prosecutor was annoying enough.
Phwwh... so... got any tattoos? I guess we're about to find out! Ahahahaha!
As if I care how your chest looks. Hahahahaha! Maybe if you have a tattoo...
What do you have to be embarrassed about? Nothing at all, I assume.
There's no holding you back. You lost fair and square.
Now I know where your real strengths and weaknesses are. Unfortunately, you're just a step or two away from losing.
Ahaha... I hope you didn't expect a bigger reaction. It's just your chest, after all.
Actually, I changed my mind. It's not so bad... for a loser. Phwwh... Ahahahaha!
It's a good thing you aren't fat. I would hate to see some disgusting, shirtless fat guy stare at me.
Honestly, I'm expecting a small development here.
Phwwh... No, I'm not snickering. Only someone ridiculous would do that. Like you. Phwwwwf...
Hahahaha. Please, just let me look away. I might choke. Phwwh...
Phwwh... What's the matter? Afraid to join me? Phwwwh... Hahahahaha!
Maybe I turrned you on in the aftermath. I don't encourage getting off to me though.
I was wondering when you you were going to get to this part.
Phwwh... I hope you don't have a small cock humiliation fetish. Ahem... I don't want to risk the chance of turning you on.
Ahahahahahaha! ...Oh come on, you knew that was coming.
Aaaaaaahahahahahahaha!
Ahaha! Ahahaha! Pwwwf... I hope you weren't hoping to impress anyone!
Phwwwh... I won't look. I won't look. I won't look. Phwwwh... I bet I know how it looks though.
I could laugh hard at you, especially if you hate it, but I am completely exhausted.
Can someone else do the laughing for me this time? I'm tired.
Well, I'm suitably nonplussed. Shall we get back to the game?
Phwwwh... Ahahahahahah! Get ready to meet your demise in a few moments.
Ahahahahaha! I was expecting smaller. You know, to match your skill at poker. Phwwwh... Ahahahahaha!
I'm not a doctor, but I'd say you're average. You have nothing to worry about. At least, for this situation.
You may have a big ego, but that won't compensate for you lack of skill in this game.
I once saw someone boldly pull out their cock in the middle of the court room, ~name~. He was automatically found guilty, though, and I was the one defending him.
Phwwh... wow... that looks like a good time... phwwwh... I mean it, really...
I bet you wanted to show off badly. Phwwh... Why couldn't you have done that earlier? Phwwh... Hahahaha!
Do those advertisements actually work?
I would assume when you send pics of that as proof of your size, they all think it's Photoshopped.
I now have my evidence to prove how much you suck.
Present your evidence right away.
I will give my verdict of your presentation.
Phwwwh... we've seen how bad your hand is, so let's see how good your pair is!
Phwwwh... I already know your bust size. Ahahahaha. So I won't be surprised.
Phwwh... Hahahahaha... How are you doing that so late in the game? Ahahahaha!
Finally, the attention will be away from me.
It took way too long to see this. It better be worth it.
Presenting useless things obviously gets you nowhere in court and card games.
Phwwwh... I would like to give you advice for the next time you play this. Ahahahahah! As if I would actually tell you. Hahahaha!
Ahahaha! Your chest is small like me, yet I'm the one who's prettier. Phwwh... Ahahahahaha!
You're obviously a natural. Phwwh... Ahahaha. I would suffocate on my own laughter if those are actually fake. Hahahahaha!
Someone who matches me in body shape. Hopefully you match my fate at this game.
Average looking, just like I expect from you.
Not bad, but I hope they're natural.
...Huh. Somehow, I expected more.
Phwwh... Maybe you're going to gloat to me about your bust. Hahahahaha! That would be hilarious to listen to.
I hope you're proud of them. Phwwh... They're the best pair you've had in a while. Hahahahahahaha!
I would indeed expect such an average player to have an average size.
If only big breasts were able to help you win at poker...
I do not envy. I just admire natural beauty. Don't give me any more details about them though.
I bet those are implants.
I was hoping you were stuffing your bra. Phwwwh...
Phwwh... Actions can speak louder than presentation, you know, ~name~? Ahahahaha!
Do you have evidence to prove they're real? Phwwh... Ahahahaha!
Like I even care whether they're real or not. Hahahaha!
There's more to gloat about than your big boobs, you know.
I have a feeling you were never trying at all.
Please, go ahead. As if I care one bit.
You're already down to this? Phwwh... I guess you really are a bad player. Phwwwh...
I guess you're at parity with me. I'll reconsider my thoughts about you.
You're at my level, ~name~? It's time to see who will meet their fate first.
Phwwwh... Ahahahaha. I'll enjoy every bit of embarrassment you have left. Hahahaha!
Considering my skill, I'd say you're a bit late to show off.
I really hope you're embarrassed. It wouldn't be nearly as funny if you aren't.
You can forfeit now if you like. Just one move with your finger, and I declare it a legal sign of defeat.
Ahahahaha! Your face is so... ahahahaha!
Please leave me be. Phwwh... I don't want you involved with me. Hahahahaha!
Phwwh... Someone else is about to lose. Phwwwh... I don't know if it is good or not if she doesn't join in. Ahahahaha!
I would be slightly more excited if I had clothes on. ...I'm just kidding. Obvious lie.
I was hoping to be the last one to have their pussy exposed.
You don't react so well to bad hands. Phwwh...
Phwwwh... Who pissed you off today? Phwwh... Or is that how you always act?
Phwwwh... Hey, ~name~, don't get angry now. It's just a game! Phwwwh...
You're like a kid getting angry over a video game. Phwwh... Except it's even worse, because you're an adult playing a card game about stripping! Phwwwh...
Did someone teach you to overreact to losing, or were you born this way? Phwwh...
Calm down, ~name~, it's just a game. Phwwwh...
Phwwh... Ahahahahahahaha! Why are you so angry? Is that your natural reaction to everything? Ahahahaha!
Phwwh... I know you're an alien, but even so, your responses are so blunt that... phwwwh...
Better give the fans some service, Otaku Bait.
How about you drop the cheerful attitude next time and play more seriously?
One of the keys to poker is to focus on your play. I assume you're losing because you care more about having fun.
I find this act very facetious, even for a game like this.
Are you trying to make me laugh? Because it's not working.
This is the consequence of overconfidence, ~name~.
I can appreciate your confidence. However, card games, like court trials, require more than just that.
I manage to keep my composure while playing. Unlike you.
Phwwh... Are you going to threaten us because you lost?
Am I supposed to be scared of you? Phwwwh...
Quit saying stuff like that. Phwwwh... You just sound so stupid. Phwwh....
Do you hate me too now? Phwwh... Am I on your hit list? Phwwwh... Ahahahahahaha!
I doubt being a detective means you're any good at this game. Phwwh...
Hah... it looks like you don't quite understand. But by your looks, I can guess that you're not all that learned.
I guess you fight better with guns than with cards.
Are you trying to look intimidating with that gun and outift? Phwwwh...
Phwwwh... Hahahahaha! You're killing me, but not with your gun. Ahahahaha!
Well, ~player~? Anything to say for yourself? ...Didn't think so.
Nothing to say, as usual. Can't say I'm surprised.
An attorney's badge doesn't prove your abilities in this game. Think before you present something next time.
I don't see what your hand proves, ~name~, besides the fact that you lost this round.
It looks like you're in contempt of court... or table.
Show us some magic. Maybe it can save you next round.
You know, maybe you should fix that attitude of yours if you want respect around here.
Relax, ~name~. I can help pay for a spa day if you're that stressed out! Phwwwf...
Phwwh... Ahahahahaha! I can't take you seriously with that attitude. Why do you have to act so sour? Phwwh... Hahahahaha!
Have you trained for this moment? Phwwwh... By the look of things, you need to go back to boot camp. Phwwwh...
Your next mission is to strip for the crowd. Phwwwh...
I think I know another good reason people make fun of you, ~name~. Phwwh... Phwwwh...
You don't play like a princess... not that you even look like one in the first place.
I hope you aren't the type of princess who refuses to take criticism. I'd hate to see your flowery wrath.
You should just stick to gardening. Or whatever it is you princesses do.
Phwwwh... ~name~, you are doing super well in this game. Phwwwh...
You're being really serious for a game about stripping, yet you're losing like an amateur! Phwwwh...
You should've played better if you're so serious about this.
Ahahahahaha! I can't take your attitude. Phwwh... Ahahahaha! You're so serious that it's funny!
Phwwh hahahahaha! And stop putting on the whole serious act. Please, hahaha!
Ahahahahaha! Quit making that face! We're playing a stripping game here!
...Phwwh! Ahahahahahaha! Why so serious? I think someone needs to loosen up!
Lance Amano pretended to be as shy as you. Perhaps you're pretending as well.
Considering how timid you are, I don't understand why you thought playing this game was a good idea.
It's your turn, ~name~. I'll be patient with you. Phwwh... I might even look away. Phwwwh...
Why did you sign up for this, ~name~? You knew this could happen.
You should consider being more careful if you're this scared of stripping, ~name~. I won't go easy on you.
